name: Knight Rush (ramjing)
description:
You are a knight that got to the enemy territory 20 seconds earlier than your peers. Survive and kill as many pawns as you can before your reinforcement comes.

Controls

Mouse or finger, either should work

Guide

The knight can move in an l-shape, just like in regular chess. Dissimilar to that, the pawn here can attack diagonally in all four directions. There will be a shadow to indicate where the next pawn is going to be placed. If a pawn had a chance to attack you, they will do it without waiting for your turn. You have 2 seconds to move every turn

Note :This game was made for 20 Second Game Jam
